title: Treating Mia Back Injury
description: Oh! There were big accidents on the road. Mia is the only person who got a heavy injury on her back and she needs immediate care and treatment. Will you be the doctor for Mia and give the personal care to Mia and heal all the injury on her back. Make her happy with awesome outfits.Enjoy surgery games at 7sgames.com
instructions: Use mouse only

title: Stick Soccer 3D
description: A new style of a soccer game is beginning with the Stick Soccer 3D game. Various football teams, soccer match tactics, various stadiums, and many other things are waiting for you with this soccer game. You can play single or two player. Also, you can participate in speed mode and you can start a soccer game with no limits. The tournament mode will bring you a cup if you can win all of the soccer matches! Let the soccer matches begin!
instructions: Player 1 and Player 2 use the same controls in turn; Use "LEFT-CLICK" on a player when your turn comes, and aim with your "MOUSE" and release to shoot.

title: Fantasy Triple Mahjong
description: A triple mahjong game with Fantasy theme. You can eliminate only three of same tiles. Those tiles can be selected which have at least 2 adjacent sides open. Take as less time as possible to get more score.
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Daily Solitaire Blue
description: Daily Solitaire Blue brings you a new klondike solitaire game every day! Enjoy different challenges and difficulty levels depending on the day of the week. Practice makes masters! Play every day and increase your chance to earn monthly rewards! Combined with the highly polished graphics that Softgames Solitaire Games are known for, Daily Solitaire Blue guarantees fun and brain teasing for hours to come! Enjoy this card game masterpiece!
instructions: The goal of the Daily Solitaire Blue is to sort all the cards into four piles. You have to start each pile's foundation with an ace and the pile has to be built in ascending order from aces up to kings. A card - or a group of cards - can be moved to one of the seven columns if the value of the topmost card is exactly one lower, and the color is different from the card it’s being moved on.

title: Merge Master
description: Merge Master: Dinosaur Fusion is a cool real-time strategy game for everyone. The main goal of the game is to beat all the enemies by combining your warriors or dinosaurs. The enemies are dragons, monsters, Trex, or other dinosaurs, so it will not be easy. Attack to take control of the enemy locations. React and think quickly. Use your strategy and tactics to win the battle and move to the next level.
instructions: Fight the final boss after merging all your creatures! In every step of this challenge, a monster with increasing power will wait for you! Apply your strategy in real-time, and spot the right combination to draw.

title: Pretty Avatar Maker
description: It's time to update your image in social networks. Our unique avatar maker will help you with this. Choose your unique avatar style. You can completely change facial features, hair color, eyes and lips. Don't forget about jewelry and accessories to make your look really unique! Whatever you do - a cute image is provided to you. Be creative or use random selection. Have some fun choosing a new avatar!
instructions: Create your own unique avatar in cartoon style. Save the result in the form of a PNG-image to use as an avatar in social networks later. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used for control.

title: Dress Up Game Fashion Stylist
description: This amazing stylist fashion show dress up and makeover games for girls has gorgeous outfits for having looks of supermodel of dress games. You can turn you look into superstar bridal in fashion show makeover and dress up offline with levels.
instructions: USE MOUSE / TACTILE PHONE

title: Super Hoops Basketball
description: Super Hoops Basketball is a puzzle game. In this game, you have to deliver a Basketball to that Hoop. Collect the stars along the way but be careful not to turn the platforms too much or else it’ll be game over!
instructions: Use the A and D, arrow keys or click on the screen to move the platforms

title: OffRoad Forest Racing
description: With extreme difficulties and the most lovely scenes, your eyes have at any point seen a 4x4 OffRoad Forest Racing game that will offer you many serious and testing tracks brimming with soil and snags. Race through the wilds of nature and gather gold coins from each level to have additional money.
instructions: Use arrow keys to drive and Space for boost.

title: 18 Wheeler Truck Parking 2
description: This truck driving game allows you to investigate many levels loaded with driving and leaving difficulties. You'll confront however circumstances motivated by reality. You'll need to leave your truck in hard-to-arrive spots, pass through extreme traffic, and all of this without harming your truck.
instructions: Use your Arrow Keys or WASD to Drive. SPACE for Brake.

title: Battle Royale Noob vs Pro
description: Welcome to Noob vs Pro vs Hacker vs God Battle Royale Offline! Rake your way through a battleground full of unexpected twists and turns to get weapons and become the last Champion! Embark on an adventurous journey: Noob, Pro, Hacker and God want to open cases with weapons to get maximum power. Kill enemies on battleground. Improve your character. Get to the top of the arena leaderboard. Find cases. Enjoy the jokes and stupid antics of Noobs. What are you waiting for? Indulge yourself in some adventures and become the hero of a brand new story.
instructions: Use left virtual joystick (or WASD) to move Use right virtual joystick to shoot

title: Tictoc KPOP Fashion
description: Help this cute girl to become tictoc kpop star by helping her to choose the right make up and clothes by following the hint. Make her look stylish on every reel. You can buy new items by getting many likes after posting the photo.
instructions: Use MOUSE to play the game.

title: Tallman Run
description: A hyper casual runner game with addictive and fun gameplay. Grow tall man, grow the wide man. Get as tall and wide as much as you can.
instructions: Drag to move left and right

title: Forest Match 2
description: Forest Match 2 is one of greatest Match 3 games of all time! Because of the huge popularity of its predecessor, the players simply asked us for more. Forest Match 2 features incredible 3000+ levels. The biggest adventure in a beautiful magical forest there has ever been: more fruits to collect, more chests of coins to discover and a saga map packed with surprises for you to enjoy!
instructions: Match at least 3 pieces of the same forest fruit. Earn points and levels ups by completing targets set for each level. Use boosters to help you out. Use touch controls or the mouse to swap and match fruits.

title: Tictoc Summer Fashion
description: This cute girl needs your help to make her into tictoc star. Buy and choose the right make up and clothes by following the hint. Make her look stylish on every reel to get many likes and money to buy new items.
instructions: Use MOUSE to play the game.

title: Sweet Shop 3D
description: Play Sweet Shop 3D online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Merge Monsters Army
description: Merge Monsters Army is a monster battle game. Your goal in this game is to strength your army to fight your enemies. Fortunately, you can use the gold coins you pass to unlock more monsters, and two identical monsters can be merged into a stronger monster, let's play together!
instructions: Tap to fight

title: Snake Yo
description: “Snake YO” is a top down style game where you are a snake and you need to eat magic food to grow and become strong. Stay as long as possible and destroy as many enemy snakes as possible to accumulate points and save your best score. Use dash to do more difficult and risky maneuvers. A very fun game to play anytime. Have a good time!
instructions: Desktop: - Use the mouse cursor to turn the snake. - Hold the left mouse button to dash. Mobile: - Touch Buttons on screen to turn the snake and use dash.

title: Paper Fighter 3D
description: In a retro environment created from paper layers; martial masters are ready to showcase their skills. Paper Fighter 3D game includes 1 or 2 player short fight matches. Each fight match consists of 3 rounds and the one who can take 2 rounds wins the match. Use your punches and kicks at the right time, the special strike will be ready when your power bar is full.
instructions: PLAYER 1 Move: "W,A,S,D" Punch: "F" Kick: "G" Special Attack: "R" PLAYER 2 Move: "ARROW KEYS" Punch: "L" Kick: "K" Special Attack: "O"

title: Mahjong Relax
description: Mahjong game with summer tiles and boards makes you feel an uninterrupted bliss of calm and relaxing beach atmosphere!! Time flies by, stress goes down, while your memory and mahjong skills are boosting...
instructions: Follow one simple rule: match and eliminate all tiles from the board! Choose between three difficulty levels, play various boards, unlock premium tiles and backgrounds.

title: Jewelry Mosaic
description: Match the Jewels together so that you can place all of the tiles on the board. Think ahead as you start placing new Jewels down. Match the edge colors together, then place the rest of the Jewels down. Try to complete all 50 levels in this fun brain teasing puzzle game.
instructions: Move Jewels on screen and put them into empty gold regions. But watch out for colors on four sides of Jewels! They need to match other Jewels

title: Shoot Em All
description: What will you do if you know the bullet tracks before a battle started in advance? Shoot Em All is more like a puzzle game than a skillful arcade game. You have to make sure your blue character is alive at every shoot. It is permitted for you to control all the guns together at each round. Could you eliminate all red enemies at all levels?
instructions: Drag to aim, loose to fire

title: Cinderella Match 3D
description: Cinderella Match 3D is a shoe pair matching game where you should match well designed and brand new shoe pairs on stand and sort them onto rack. Polished pairs of high heels, flat shoes, sneakers and more super designed shoes are waiting for you! Unlock all wonderful shoes by matching shoes onto stand and find the Cinderella's foot.
instructions: Use mouse and drag-drop shoes to stand.

title: 18 Wheeler Truck Parking
description: In this 18 Wheeler Truck Parking game, you get to drive a portion of the world's heaviest trucks. Utilize your amazing driving abilities to leave these noteworthy trucks in their assigned parking spaces without crashing them into different vehicles. Additionally, you ought to focus on the traffic, and plan your shopping procedure in a like manner.
instructions: Use your Arrow Keys or WASD to Drive the Truck. SPACE for Break.

title: Twisty Roads!
description: Drive along the road and go through checkpoints to score. Collect coins for vehicles purchase. The roads keep getting harder and harder. Can you beat the most dangerous road??
instructions: Follow ingame instructions.

title: Mini Coins
description: Jump over the stage evading obstacles and enemies to collect coins that are everywhere! You can also test your skills by collecting coins on the speedrun mode.
instructions: Mobile: -Touch to Jump. Desktop: -C, Up Arrow or Left Click to Jump.

title: Freaky Monster Rush
description: It's time to start an afresh race. In Freaky Monster Rush, you can transform into the hottest monster. To merge the DNA of each component of your monster runner limb by limb, complete each obstacle course by evading barrels, knocking back your foes, and running through the proper gates.
instructions: Slide to move

title: Bus Parking City 3D
description: Bus Parking City 3D is a realistic Bus Driving game and Bus Simulator having a 3D gameplay. With each passing level come more difficulty and require much more of your expertise to reach the next level. This game will also test your driving expertise as a bus driver as is not as easy as a car and parking the bus is even more critical.
instructions: WASD or Arrow keys to drive the bus

title: Bubble Shooter Candy 2
description: Bubble Shooter Candy 2 is the long-awaited second instalment of the legendary Bubble Shooter game. The unique combination of the best Bubble Shooter game with the nicest and cutest candies will make you fall in love with this game from the first pop! What is the highest score you can achieve? Enjoy Bubble Shooter Candy 2 now and make the candies pop!
instructions: Pop all candies on the board, scoring as many points as possible. Use the mouse or your finger to aim and shoot. Pop two or more candies by hitting them with a candy of the same color. The more candies you pop in one shot, the more points you get. Failing to pop any candies will earn you a foul. After several fouls, a new line of candies will be added at the top as a penalty. Adjust your winning strategies in each game!

title: Spider Swing Manhattan
description: It's the adventures of Spidey. Tap to shoot a web and hold to swing. Let go and see yourself soar through the urban landscape. Swing from point to point, and try not to fall or hit any dangerous obstacles. How far can you swing with your spider powers?
instructions: Shoot webs and swing through the city.

title: My Perfect Weekend Outfits
description: Welcome to My Perfect Weekend Outfits. Are you ready for a crazy weekend with these Rainbow Girls? Do you know what they have planned? Play this game and help these girls get ready for a weekend full of adventures, but most importantly, help them get ready for it. They need to look absolutely fabulous so you need to help them find the perfect outfit and accessories, as well as the hairstyle!
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click

title: CatRobot Idle TD Battle Cat
description: This is an online version of the hilarious Google play game but now your kingdom is invaded by monsters. Make your warrior cats stronger, build your biggest robot to defeat frontier enemies. An easy to play tower defense game, just one touch, but with a lot of fun, you will definitely get caught up in those epic battles.
instructions: PC controls: Use the mouse to aim and left click to shoot the arrows Mobile and Tablet Controls: Tap on the screen and move to shoot the arrows

title: Money Rush
description: Multiply your coins, select the best gates and collect lots of money! Money Rush is a fun runner game with one goal: get rich! Collect coins as much as you can to turn your game into a cash rush!
instructions: Are you good at simple math? Or just looking for fun money games for kids? Amazing! This money game is just right for you. As you roll your coins you do the math and choose the best gate to increase your amount to become the money master! The more coins you collect the bigger your coin rush will be. Upgrade your coin game for the ultimate rich roll.

title: Guess the path
description: Guess the Path is a puzzle game for the smartest of you. So yes, the first levels are quite simple and you will tell yourself that it is a game for children ... but not at all, try the more difficult levels ... you will understand that this game is not for put in all hands ... or rather not to put in all brains. You must thus connect all the boxes together and fill in the grid completely. It's simple but it becomes quite difficult as the size of the grid increases.
instructions: The principle of the game is very simple, you must fill the grid with numbers ranging from 1 to X. The numbers must follow each other on the grid, that is to say that for example the box number 2 must be located next to the box 1, and box 3 must be located next to box 2, etc ...

title: Cyberpunk World: Resistance
description: Cyber police have been ordered to take control of your city. They have surrounded you and are preparing for an assault! You have to lead a resistance squad and prevent this with all available forces. It's battle time!
instructions: WASD - move Left-click - shoot Mouse wheel - switch weapons L-shift - run Space - jump Double space - use jet pack C - crouch

title: Dirt Bike Racing Duel
description: What about riding your Dirt Bike over seven continents in lots of different countries, lands, and places? The places where you'll ride your bike is prepared for the dirt bike duel races. Your goal is to get your bike to the finish line without crashing. You can play Dirt Bike in single or in two player modes. You can duel against a friend in 2 player game mode. There are lots of levels and exciting surprises inside these levels that will be waiting for you! Check the shop sometimes and don't forget to buy new bikes or upgrade your current bike!
instructions: PLAYER 1 Gas/Brake: "W,S" Balance: "A,D" PLAYER 2 Gas/Brake: "UP-DOWN ARROW KEYS" Balance: "LEFT-RIGHT ARROW KEYS"

title: 2 Player Dark Racing
description: Get your vehicle and race it on the tracks against different drivers. In this 2 Player Dark Racing game, you can play against your friends in the 2-player split-screen or single-player mode.
instructions: Use Arrow Keys (Player 1) or WASD (Player 2) to Drive.

title: Color Match 3D
description: Color Match 3D is a very fun online puzzle game for boys for free. You can paint anytime and anywhere. According to the target item, just mix colors in the palette, paint a 3D model, and compare your mixed colors with the target to decide your grade. Finally, your designed items will be auctioned according to their quality, or displayed in your orchard. I guess it's easy for you. Are you ready to try it now?
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Battalion Commander 1917
description: During World War I, a regular yet brave soldier receives seemingly impossible orders. In a race against time, he must cross over into enemy territory to find an enormous enemy machine and destroy it that could potentially save 1,600 of his fellow comrades. This soldier is you! Free the fellow soldiers held captive on the enemy territory and they will join you in the mission. Collect gold during each run to buy valuable upgrades including a heavy tank!
instructions: The squad follows your mouse/finger. Click the left mouse button or tap the skill button to activate skill (if It's purchased).

title: Shooter Craft
description: Shooter Craft combines the well-known Minecraft style and an adventure story. Beat the evil zombies and biting creepers. Collect the specified number of diamonds at each level to open the mysterious door and go to a more difficult level!
instructions: Control is available on the computer (WASD and space keys) and the phone (arrows and the firing button).

title: Crazy Dunk
description: Are you ready? Let's slam dunks together and win the game! Simple operation, easy decompression mini-games, Crazy Dunk is coming!
instructions: Tap the screen continuously to slam dunk

title: Draw Car Road
description: This game is actually not a car avoiding arcade game but a bridge drawing puzzle game with 3D cartoon game art animations. It is managed for you to draw a bridge for the yellow car to overpass all kinds of terrains and the red flag on the platform track at each level. Glad you will complete all levels and have fun!
instructions: Draw a line on the marked areas!

title: Classic Solitaire Blue
description: Classic Solitaire Blue brings the all-time classic card game to a modern classy setting. It answers the players calls for the “traditional” to be married with the “modern”. Featuring the classic solitaire gameplay we all love together with a relaxing soundtrack, it guarantees hours of brain teasing and fun. Combined with the highly polished graphics that Softgames solitaire games are known for, this is a must play for all lovers of solitaire! Enjoy this card game masterpiece!
instructions: Sort all cards to the four piles on the left. First decide how many cards you want draw, 1 is better for a beginner, 3 are more challenging. Flip cards to find their value and drag them onto any card of an opposite color and suit. The cards have to be sorted based on their rank. Each pile’s foundation starts with an ace and has to be built in ascending order from aces to kings. A card - or a group of cards - can be moved to one of the seven columns as long as its ranking and color suit.

title: Tank Zombies 3D
description: A not too distant future that's overrun with zombies.The only weapons left for the survivors are a few tanks.You are the only one who can break through the swarm of zombies and save the world.Level up your units to fight against zombies that are steadily growing in power.Endless swarms of zombies will descend upon you.
instructions: Drag to move tanks

title: Desire IO
description: A dynamic multiplayer game with a first-person view! There are several game modes available for you to choose from that are suitable for all players. Unlock and upgrade fighters, complete tasks and compete with other players in tournaments!
instructions: Moving - WASD Shooting - Left mouse button Aiming - Right mouse button Changing weapons - Mouse Wheel Jump - Space Sit down - C Running - Shift to the left You can also change the controls in the game settings.

title: Angry Rex Online
description: Get ready to join Angry Rex's journey in dinosaur simulation game. Angry Rex is a side scrolling action game that features amazing simulation. Destroy everything on your way and eat all the enemies. Escape from the traps and travel through many levels to burn down the world. Eat people, destroy enemies, trucks, jump and make a bloodbath in this amazing game.
instructions: PC controls: Use the arrow keys to move, jump and kill the soldiers. Use the spacebar key to roar. Mobile controls: Tap on the game buttons to move, jump and kill the soldiers.

title: Zen Triple 3D
description: Zen Triple 3D is a challenging matching game but also is full of relaxation,that satisfies even the busiest person, makes your free time valuable. You will find all 3D objects and themes are familiar, inspired by everyday life, to make it a captivating colorful game.
instructions: - Match 3 Same Objects! Simply find and connect three identical objects till the bubble ball is completely cleaned to solve and master the puzzle. - Rotate The Ball 360! The difference is that you can observe all the items in all directions by rotating the transparent bubble! - Proper use of props! While items in the bubble are too hard to distinguish, also you can use props to help you go more smoothly.

title: Basketball King
description: Most realistic physics provides you with the best and most realistic ball shooting experience. Train yourself anywhere and anytime. Beat all records and all opponents. Play with your friends in be the Basketball King!
instructions: Swipe to throw the ball

title: Truck Driver: Snowy Roads
description: Master truck drivers are ready to prove their skills on challenging snowy roads! Check out the Missions section or compete in Races to unlock new and more powerful trucks. There are 12 OffRoad Trucks in total in the Truck Driver: Snowy Roads and they all have different styles, power and driving. If you want, you can also try your luck in the Free Drive section. Maybe there will be random missions where you can get coins! Choose the music you want from the radio and start the adventure!
instructions: PLAYER 1 Move: "W,A,S,D" Break: "SPACE" Camera: "C" Respawn: "R" PLAYER 2 Move: "ARROW KEYS Break: "DOWN ARROW" Respawn: "U"

title: Stylish Crop Top Trends
description: Welcome to the Stylish Crop Top Trends game. Rainbow high school girls Noah, Willow, and Dee dee are planned to try crop tops to adapt to the latest trends. Crop Tops are the must-have this summer, and the more you have in your wardrobe, the better! Now, if you wonder how to wear a crop top, we are here to help! Even though jeans may be the perfect base for a crop top look, shorts and skirts are also good matches!
instructions: Left mouse button click
